name: Flame of Blood, Blaze My Path
descHash:
Cold dew congealed on the blade, sliding down in crimson streaks.
The rust-tainted wilderness still flickered with embers of battle, flames leaping upon the ashes.

"Mydeimos, that was a godlike fight just now!"
A bare-chested warrior wiped his weapon clean, shouting in exhilaration.

"Mydei, one day, I'll be as invincible as you!"
A child gazed at him with reverence, clutching a broken sword in small hands.

"Crown Prince, our return to Castrum Kremnos is within sight."
An aged man smiled, raising his cup in a toast to him.

He nodded silently and walked to the edge of the camp.
The pain of rebirth still coursed across his skin. Tomorrow, he would lead the Kremnoan detachment forth once again, migrating to foreign lands.
Where this wandering would end, he did not know. The only certainty was this — he would bear the duty of a king until the blood and flames consumed him.

As night deepened, he drank the bloodwine alone. A passing bard plucked at his strings, a wandering melody drifting through the air—
"Home is the land of dreams, not a place one can ever reach."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

635680.name: Borisin Teeth
635680.desc: Broken teeth fragments left behind during the borisin conquests. Used to level up Traces slightly for Destruction characters.
635680.lore:
Borisin consider their teeth as a warrior's blade and weapon.
The borisin worship warriors possessing supreme power. In their tribes, where the strong rule the weak, those with dental caries will only be discarded by the group.

"O, Brood Lord, grant us sharp teeth and claws."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

836266.name: Moon Rage Fang
836266.desc: Terrifying tusks left behind during the borisin conquests. Used to level up Traces significantly for Destruction characters.
836266.lore:
Borisin can further enhance their bodies through their innate "Moon Rage."
The battle-frenzied warriors exhibit incredible healing abilities, shedding the blood of their enemies in a sanguine mist together with the unbridled growth of their muscles and bones.

"O, Brood Lord, grant us divine strength."

920207.name: Lupitoxin Sawteeth
920207.desc: Blood-sucking sharp fangs left behind during the borisin conquests. Used to level up Traces moderately for Destruction characters.
920207.lore:
Borisin consider their teeth as a warrior's blade and weapon.
A maddening impulse flows through the borisin blood. Fueled by Lupitoxin, they rend their enemies with their sawteeth and suck their blood, and are undefeated.

"O, Brood Lord, grant us steel skin and bones."

20170864.name: Courage-Torn Chest
20170864.desc: A fragment of the Strife Titankins after their demise. Normal material used for enhancement.
20170864.lore:
The slothful generals began to drill, and the reclusive sages began to plot. Then humanity discovered they could shatter the creations of gods, and slaughter became war.

"Fear is the chisel of courage."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Crepuscular Beasts at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

20389475.name: Glory-Aspersed Torso
20389475.desc: The heart of a Strife Titankin, full of divine power. Advanced material used for enhancement.
20389475.lore:
In the beginning, humanity fought wars to stay alive, but now some fight as fearlessly as the Titankins of Strife to achieve death. The Kremnoans say that perhaps warriors of flesh and stone share the same heart —

"And this heart is called glory, with courage flowing within."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Crepuscular Beasts at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

20445700.name: Fear-Stomped Flesh
20445700.desc: Dust that forms the Strife Titankins. Crude material used for enhancement.
20445700.lore:
The tide of death sweeps across the world, and giants of hatred and resentment step forth from the River of Souls. All fear and cower before that stone-carved legion.

"Slaughter is the stone from which fear is hewn."

skill.name: Vista
skill.descHash:
Increases the wearer's Max HP by #1[i]% and Incoming Healing by #6[i]%. When using Skill or Ultimate, consumes HP equal to #2[f1]% of the wearer's Max HP and increases the DMG dealt by this attack by #3[i]%. If this effect's consumed HP is greater than #4[i], the DMG additionally increases by #5[i]%.
If the current HP is not sufficient, this effect reduces the wearer's current HP down to 1.
